name: Ethos [Prototype]
description:
Ethos is a psychological horror game -  Taking your usual holiday to a campsite that has always seemed safe. This time it feels different. Ethos

This prototype is a short section of our game, to give you an opportunity to first experience the world of Ethos. We are eager to gather feedback and ideas to implement into our further development of the game. 

A story awaits you...

You drive to your usual getaway, a forest away from anything human. Setting down your tent, the storm above rages on. You decide to take an early night but something doesn't feel right.  

Download
